A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: JJ Abrams  handed Rian Johnson the keys to a billion dollar movie and Johnson drove it off a cliff. In a plot line that rivaled Space Balls (spoiler alert) \n\nThe Empire chases the rebels waiting for their ship to run out of gas. This was my least favorite SW movie. Disney needs to remove Johnson from having any future part in SW movies. So disappointed - I'll watch it again to see if it was just a bad night but I felt let down.
